name: Bat (serci98)
description:
How are wonderful the bats! They can’t see but just hear the world around! It must be magic. Do you want to try?

=> INSTRUCTIONS 

-> Arrow keys to move

-> Press space for shoot ultrasounds

-> Avoid red spikes and cats

That’s all. Have fun playing the game.

=> CREDITS

Music took to here:

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/18386475/

Inspiration took from a game by thegreenflash.

Some codes took to griffpatch

All the rest is by me (particle system included)

=========================================

That's all. Have fun!
